meanings.definition: The act of producing new coins.
meanings.sent1: The recoinage at the mint was a busy time for the workers.
meanings.sent2: The government decided to initiate a recoinage to improve the currency system.
meanings.sent3: During the recoinage, the coins were so shiny that they blinded the workers momentarily.
meanings.sent4: The recoinage was like a fresh start for the economy, bringing new hope to the people.
meanings.sent5: The recoinage was a magical transformation of old metal into shiny new coins.

meanings.definition: The process of replacing old coins with new ones.
meanings.sent1: The recoinage of the old currency was a meticulous task.
meanings.sent2: After the recoinage, the market was flooded with gleaming new coins.
meanings.sent3: The recoinage turned into a fun game of swapping old coins for new ones.
meanings.sent4: The recoinage felt like a refreshing breeze in the world of numismatics.
meanings.sent5: The recoinage transformed the worn-out coins into symbols of prosperity.
